name: Mouse.avi Test
description:
MOUSE IS BACK!!1!!

Controls =

Arrow keys = Singing poses

1 = Switch to Normal Mickey

2 = Switch to Happy Mickey

3 = Switch to Happier Mickey :)

4 = Switch to TOO MUCH HAPPY Mickey

5 = Switch to Alt Mickey

SPACE = Mickey's laugh animation

E = Next song

M = Mute/Unmute audio
